title: Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform
description:
Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform.

Description:
Sometimes, the server's CPU usage reaches 100% and stays at 100% until the server is restarted. This issue has been reproduced with multiple Java versions: 1.6.007, 1.6.018, 1.6.021.

The issue seems to be a duplicate of Bug 46373. The Jetty team has fixed a similar issue, as documented at http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel. Some logging has been added to the NioEndpoint.java file.

- 25997: NioEndpoint.java and simple web application
